DOC.brief_summary: This 12 week , multi-site , double-blind , vehicle-controlled study subject mild moderate facial acne . Subjects randomize 1:1 apply either topical NAG vehicle gel daily . Subjects evaluate clinical acne quality life outcome baseline , 2 week , 4 week , 8 week 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Clinical Effect Daily Next Scienceâ„¢ Acne Gel ( NAG ) Mild Moderate Facial Acne
DOC.detailed_description: Sample Size : N= 60 complete subject Male female subject 12 year old diagnose mild moderate inflammatory facial acne vulgaris . Subjects treat daily topical NAG match vehicle attend screening , randomization , 2,4,8 12 week visit . The follow assess : 1 . Lesion count photography 2 . Investigator Global Assessment 3 . Acne Quality Life Questionnaire 4 . Treatment Area Assessment Investigator Subjects discontinue baseline topical acne treatment 2 week washout and/or systemic acne treatment 3 week washout . All subject provide open label Cetaphil facial cleanser double-blind NAG vehicle product .
